name: family-calendar-app
description: Family Calendar with Task Management and Meal Planning

scripts.start: npm run kill-ports && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && ng build
scripts.deploy:gcp:set-env: gcloud run services update family-hub --region us-central1 --set-env-vars NODE_ENV=production
